378460.name: LOTUS-Simulator Module: Streets of LOTUS
378460.description:
Another module in LOTUS is called “Streets of LOTUS” and is besides “Rails -” and “Wings of LOTUS” one option to unlock driving in LOTUS. “Streets of LOTUS” unlocks wheel-bound vehicles of all kind, for example

  • Bus - single decker
  • Bus - double decker
  • Bus - articulated and double articulated
  • Bus - trolleybus
  • Bus - track guided
  • Electric vehicles
  • cars and trucks
  • cycles and motorcycles
  • tracked vehicles

LOTUS provides the technical requirements to create vehicles and content of this kind physically and technically accurate. The standard content of the game contains the low floor double decker bus MAN Lion's City DD, which is used in Berlin since 2004, and an affectionate charming map for the first experiences on the street.
378460.supported_languages:
英语, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
